variable.name: GENEVA_ID
variable.comment: Anonymous ID generated by GENEVA Coordinating Center to replace our local IDs.

variable.name: FAMID
variable.comment: Assigned Number grouping people who are from the same family.

variable.name: Consent
variable.description: Consent restrictions on type of research.
variable.value: Limited to genetic studies relevant to oral health.

variable.name: Exam_Done
variable.comment: This is an indicator whether or not a dental exam was completed if it was part of the protocol.

variable.name: Age_Exam
variable.description: Age at time of dental exam.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Calculated by taking Date of dental exam minus age or birth date from the sources listed in DOCFILE. Also calculated by taking StudyDoc_66MONTH Questionnaire_Iowa (Q1, Today's date) and subtracting StudyDoc_Recruitment Questionnaire_Iowa (Date of Birth).

variable.name: Birth_Year
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Year portion from sources listed in DOCFILE.

variable.name: Ht_M
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field.

variable.name: Wt_Kg
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field.

variable.name: Girth_Cm
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field.

variable.name: Edentulous
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating not obtained, but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Without any indication in procedure 4.8 of any tooth or surface present.

variable.name: Prim_Tot_Teeth_Present
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any primary tooth as present that has nothing indicating the tooth is missing.

variable.name: Prim_Tot_Surface_Present
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a primary tooth as present where the tooth is present and there is nothing indicating the surface is missing. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of non-missing scores.

variable.name: Prim_st
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting as sound any primary tooth marked as completely sound. Teeth with white spots are excluded from this count. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of teeth with all surfaces scored as (0, 10, 20, 60).

variable.name: Prim_swt
variable.description: Total Primary Sound Teeth + teeth with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting as sound any primary tooth marked as clinically sound (includes white spot).

variable.name: Prim_wt
variable.description: Total Primary Teeth with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any primary tooth marked as having a white spot. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of teeth with any surfaces scored as (11,21,61,71) but no surfaces scored as (12,22,30,31,32,40,41,42,50,62,72).

variable.name: Prim_dt
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any primary tooth marked as having decay. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of teeth with any surfaces scored as (12,22,62,72) but no surfaces scored as (30,31,32,40,41,42,50).

variable.name: Prim_ft
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any primary tooth that has been filled. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of teeth with any surfaces scored as (30,31,32,40,41,42,50).

variable.name: Prim_mt
variable.description: Total Primary Teeth missing due to decay.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any primary tooth marked as missing due to decay.

variable.name: Prim_d1ft
variable.description: Total Primary Tooth caries with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any primary tooth included in the Prim_ft, Prim_dt, and Prim_wt variables. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of teeth with any surfaces scored as (11,21,61,71) but no surfaces scored as (12,22,30,31,32,40,41,42,50,62,72).

variable.name: Prim_d2ft
variable.description: Total Primary Tooth caries without white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any primary tooth included in Prim_ft and Prim_dt variables. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of Prim_dt and Prim_ft.

variable.name: Prim_ss
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting as sound any surface on a primary tooth marked as completely sound. Surfaces with white spots are excluded from this count.

variable.name: Prim_sws
variable.description: Total Primary Sound Surfaces + surfaces with with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting as sound any surface on a primary tooth marked as clinically sound (includes white spot).

variable.name: Prim_ws
variable.description: Total Primary Surfaces with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a primary tooth marked as having a white spot. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of surfaces scored as (11,21,61,71).

variable.name: Prim_ds
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a primary tooth marked as having decay. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of surfaces scored as (12,22,62,72).

variable.name: Prim_fs
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a primary tooth marked as having been filled. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of surfaces scored as (30,31,32,40,41,42,50).

variable.name: Prim_ms
variable.description: Total Primary Surfaces missing due to decay.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a primary tooth marked as missing due to decay.

variable.name: Prim_d1fs
variable.description: Total Primary Surface caries with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a primary tooth included in variables: Prim_fs, Prim_ds, Prim_ws. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of surfaces scored as (11,21,61,71).

variable.name: Prim_d2fs
variable.description: Total Primary Surface caries without white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a primary tooth included in variables: Prim_fs, Prim_ds. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of surfaces scored as (12,22,30,31,32,40,41,42,50,62,72).

variable.name: Perm_Tot_Teeth_Present
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any permanent tooth as present that has nothing indicating the tooth is missing.

variable.name: Perm_Tot_Surface_Present
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a permanent tooth as present where the tooth is present and there is nothing indicating the surface is missing.

variable.name: PERM_ST
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting as sound any permanent tooth marked as completely sound. Teeth with white spots are excluded from this count.

variable.name: PERM_SWT
variable.description: Total Permanent Sound Teeth + teeth with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting as sound any permanent tooth marked as clinically sound (includes white spot).

variable.name: PERM_WT
variable.description: Total Permanent Teeth with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any permanent tooth marked as having a white spot.

variable.name: PERM_DT
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any permanent tooth marked as having decay.

variable.name: PERM_FT
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any permanent tooth marked as having been filled. For StudyDoc_Prim Dentition Exam_Iowa: Sum of teeth with any surface scored as (30,31,32,40,41,42,50).

variable.name: PERM_MT
variable.description: Total Permanent Teeth missing due to decay.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any permanent tooth marked as missing due to decay.

variable.name: PERM_D1MFT
variable.description: Total Permanent Tooth caries with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any permanent tooth included in the Perm_MT, Perm_FT, Perm_DT, and Perm_WT variables.

variable.name: PERM_D2MFT
variable.description: Total Permanent Tooth caries without white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any permanent tooth included in Perm_MT, Perm_FT, Perm_DT variables.

variable.name: PERM_SS
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting as sound any surface on a permanent tooth marked as completely sound. Surfaces with white spots are excluded from this count.

variable.name: PERM_SWS
variable.description: Total Permanent Sound Surfaces + surfaces with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting as sound any surface on a permanent tooth marked clinically sound (includes white spot).

variable.name: PERM_WS
variable.description: Total Permanent Surfaces with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a permanent tooth marked as having a white spot.

variable.name: PERM_DS
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a permanent tooth marked as having decay.

variable.name: PERM_FS
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a permanent tooth marked as having been filled.

variable.name: PERM_MS
variable.description: Total Permanent Surfaces missing due to decay.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a permanent tooth marked as missing due to decay.

variable.name: PERM_D1MFS
variable.description: Total Permanent Surface caries with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a permanent tooth included in variables: Perm_MS, Perm_FS, Perm_DS, and Perm_WS.

variable.name: PERM_D2MFS
variable.description: Total Permanent Surface caries without white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived by counting any surface on a permanent tooth included in variables: Perm_MS, Perm_FS, and Perm_DS.

variable.name: Tot_Teeth_Present
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting total primary teeth present plus total permanent teeth present.

variable.name: Tot_Surface_Present
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting total primary surfaces present plus total permanent surfaces present.

variable.name: TOT_ST
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting total primary sound teeth (teeth included in variable: Prim_st) and total permanent sound teeth (teeth included in variable: Perm_ST).

variable.name: TOT_SWT
variable.description: Total Sound Teeth + teeth with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting total primary clinically sound teeth (teeth included in variable: Prim_swt) and total permanent clinically sound teeth (teeth included in variable: Perm_SWT).

variable.name: TOT_WT
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all teeth with white spots (teeth included in variables: Perm_WT and Prim_wt).

variable.name: TOT_FT
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all teeth that are filled (teeth included in variables: Perm_FT and Prim_ft).

variable.name: TOT_D1T
variable.description: Total Decayed Teeth with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all teeth with any decay including white spots (teeth included in variables: Perm_DT, Perm_WT, Prim_dt, and Prim_wt).

variable.name: TOT_D2T
variable.description: Total Decayed Teeth without white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all teeth with any decay (teeth included in variables: Perm_DT and Prim_dt).

variable.name: TOT_MT
variable.description: Total Teeth missing due to decay.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all teeth that are missing due to decay (teeth included in variables: Perm_MT and Prim_mt).

variable.name: TOT_D1MFT
variable.description: Total Tooth caries with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all teeth with tooth caries (teeth included in variables: Perm_D1MFT and Prim_d1ft) including white spots.

variable.name: TOT_D2MFT
variable.description: Total Tooth caries without white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all teeth with tooth caries not including white spots (teeth included in variables: Perm_D2MFT and Prim_d2ft).

variable.name: TOT_SS
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all sound surfaces. This count excludes surfaces with white spot (surfaces included in variables: Perm_SS and Prim_ss).

variable.name: TOT_SWS
variable.description: Total Sound Surfaces + surfaces with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all clinically sound surfaces (includes white spot) (surfaces included in variables: Perm_SWS and Prim_sws).

variable.name: TOT_WS
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all surfaces with white spots (surfaces included in variables: Perm_WS and Prim_ws).

variable.name: TOT_FS
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all surfaces that are filled (surfaces included in variables: Perm_FS and Prim_fs).

variable.name: TOT_D1S
variable.description: Total Decayed Surfaces with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all surfaces with any decay including white spots (surfaces included in variables: Perm_DS, Perm_WS, Prim_ws and Prim_ds).

variable.name: TOT_D2S
variable.description: Total Decayed Surfaces without white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all surfaces with any decay (surfaces included in variables: Perm_DS and Prim_ds) not including white spots.

variable.name: TOT_MS
variable.description: Total Surfaces missing due to decay.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all missing surfaces due to decay (surfaces included in variables: Perm_MS and Prim_ms).

variable.name: TOT_D1MFS
variable.description: Total Surface caries with white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all surfaces with caries (surfaces included in variables: Perm_D1MFS and Prim_d1fs) including white spots.

variable.name: TOT_D2MFS
variable.description: Total Surface caries without white spots.
variable.comment: '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Derived from counting all surfaces with caries not including white spots (surfaces included in variables: Perm_D2MFS and Prim_d2fs).

variable.name: Income_3cat
variable.description: Family's yearly income in 3 categories from Iowa.
variable.comment: -9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field.

variable.name: Saliva_flow
variable.comment: -9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Saliva plus tube weight - tube weight=only weight of saliva divided by 3 minutes to derive ml/min.

variable.name: Home_NAF_lvl
variable.comment: -9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Fluoride level (ppm) assigned to home tap water.

variable.name: S_mutans
variable.comment: Dentocult and/or DNA. '-9 is also a valid value indicating 'not obtained ', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field.

variable.name: Brushfreq
variable.comment: -9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field. Not all values appear in the data set, but should be retained in the data dictionary.

variable.name: Watersource
variable.comment: -9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field.

variable.name: Fruit_juice_oz_day
variable.comment: -9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field.

variable.name: Juice_oz_day
variable.comment: -9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field.

variable.name: Pwd_bev_oz_day
variable.comment: -9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field.

variable.name: Soda_oz_day
variable.comment: -9 is also a valid value indicating 'missing', but does not reflect the minimum data value for a field.
